content.rendered:
#1 Automated Dialer

Auto Dialer Software:

Auto Phone Dialing System

Auto Dialer is an advanced auto-dialing solution for outbound contact centers. It auto-dials unlimited numbers, connects agents with live calls and leaves a pre-recorded voice message. Highly useable for marketing, promotion, fundraising, and notification purpose.

Request a Demo
5 star rating
★★★★★ 5/5

Trusted by over 12,000 business
and 18,000 users

Previous
Next
Auto Dialer Overview

What is Auto Dialer software?

The Auto Dialer is an outbound dialing solution that dials multiple calls from an assigned list. It connects the prospect with the agents or bypasses unproductive/ unanswered calls immediately. It also broadcasts voicemail and provides a keypad responding option. The Auto Dialer software is subdivided into Predictive, Progressive, and Power Dialers.

Request a Demo
Types of Auto Dialer

Grow Your Valuable Business With Dialer360
Auto Dialer software

There are different types of auto dialers that are all highly productive and useful with different features and services. you can choose the best one after understanding the fundamental functionality of these auto-dialers.

  • Predictive Dialer
  • Power Dialer
  • Progressive Dialer
  • Robo Dialer

A predictive auto dialer dials multiple calls simultaneously by predicting the agent's time availability. The predictive auto dialer dials multiple numbers for each agent but only transfers connected calls. The predictive dialer also skips unproductive calls, answering machines, etc.

It auto-manages multiple campaigns, sales and provides on-time reports. It is a perfect tool to target a large audience in a short time. A predictive dialer mainly converts an agent's idle time into productive talk time. Read More

A fast auto dialer that provides dialing speed control to the agents where they can dial the next number through a click according to their convenience and availability.  The agents can also start auto-dialing mode.  Read More

The progressive dialer provides additional features along with auto dialer functions. The software can display customer data to the agent before dialing. The agent can then initiate or skip the call based on the customer’s data or history. This is a highly useful auto dialer for maintaining quality leads. Read More

Robo Dialer broadcasts your pre-recorded voicemail automatically to a large audience effectively.  All you need to do is upload your customer list, select a campaign, and start engaging a massive audience in no time through voicemail or text-to-speech messages.

Awards

Award-winning customer service

Due to our innovative solution for call center organization, our company recognized as a leading company.

Why Choose Us

Why Choose Dialer360
Auto Dialer Software?

Request a Demo

Automated Solution

Dialer360 Auto Dialer software conveniently manages everything automatically. It auto manages dialing, campaign, sales, and results, thus preventing wasted time and energy over manual work while streamlining the dialing process.

Maximum Productivity

Auto dialer provides fast dialing and is a convenient solution that manages multiple campaigns effortlessly. It properly utilize the agent's idle time and provides unlimited dedicated leads for sales conversion.

Cost Effective

Auto dialer is the most economical solution for dialing and voicemail broadcasting at large scale. It requires no equipment installation, contract or annual subscription. Pay only for what you use with our Pay as You Go pricing.

Feature List

Dialer360 Auto dialer Features

Our Auto Dialer software facilitates businesses through various value-added features, which include but are not limited to campaign building, dialing, process automation, setting up support, etc.

Live Transfers To Agent

Auto Dialer software dials unlimited numbers and only transfers calls answered by prospects to the agent. It perfectly utilizes the agent's time and provides more sale opportunities.

DNC List

Autodial Software ensures the safety and compliance of your campaigns. You can add restricted numbers to the DNC feature of the auto dialer in order to avoid calling or broadcast messages to numbers included in the DNC list.

On-time Statistics and Results

It auto-generates on-time statistics, results, and analysis. It’s highly valuable for performance measurement and decision-making. With these helpful features, you can get accurate campaign results conveniently.

Press-1 Campaign

Get dedicated leads and customer response through the Press-1 campaign. It is a keypad based response prompt for your target audience. The audience can call back or respond by pressing through a number of options incorporated through the Press-1 campaign.

Auto Redial

The Auto Dialer is integrated with a smart redial feature that saves unanswered numbers and can redial automatically or through a schedule.

Local Caller ID

Local Caller IDs can also be provided with the Dialer360 Auto Dialers. This feature helps you make multiple calls to people with their respective area codes, thus creating a trustable and strong connection with the prospect.

Auto Recording And Monitoring

The dialer records and monitors live calls which helps in training along with quality and compliance.

Text To Speech

You can broadcast pre-recorded voicemail through Robo Dialer or simply use the text-to-speech feature allowing you to broadcast your message through a system generated voice.

Multi-Tenant

The dialer allows you to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. You can cover a large audience in a short time with multi-tenant architecture.

CRM Integrations

Dialer360 can integrate with
your favourite CRM

Application & Usage

Where can the
Auto Dialer be used?

  • Political Campaigns
  • Marketing and advertisement
  • Fundraising campaigns
  • Market research and product promotion
  • Emergency notification and reminder
  • Phone Surveys
Have a Questions?

FAQ's

An autodialer is the most efficient marketing and broadcasting tool. The following FAQs will help you understand more about the auto dialer software.
Request a Demo
What is an Auto Dialer?
A smart and auto outbound dialing solution. It speedily keeps on auto-dialing numbers and connects the call answer by the prospect with the agents. Besides, skip unanswered, unproductive calls or leave a voice message. It also auto manage campaign, sales, leads, and results. It’s a cloud base solution with a simple web-based user interface. It’s specially designed to automate all the dialing and telesales process. In fact, it’s a mass communication system to contact large audiences in a short time effortlessly. It’s widely used by leading industries for marketing, voicemail broadcasting. Moreover for leads generation, fundraising, and mass notification purpose.
How does the Auto Dialer work?
Dialer360 auto dialer is a cloud base software with a simple user interface. It quickly auto-dials multiple calls and connects live calls with the agent. Besides, auto bypass unproductive calls including voicemail machine. It’s a cost-effective solution to target a large audience in a short time automatically. Importantly, provide on-time results, stats, and manage auto campaigns too. Furthermore, also provide voicemail broadcasting, voicemail drop, and press 1 campaign option. Undoubtedly, a complete modern solution for marketing, advertising, sales, and voice broadcasting. It automates all your outbound dialing solution and provides amazing results effortlessly.
What Is The Best Auto Dialer?

There are multiple auto dialers. Every auto dialer software performs similar basic functions however has some different features and functions too.You can choose the best auto dialer according to your campaign’s requirements and needs. It will help you get the desires results more effectively.
The predictive dialer is the most predictive dialer. It can instantly auto-dials multiple numbers through time prediction analysis. It perfectly connects the agent’s idle time into talk time and provides 5x more leads and sales. The power dialer allows the agents to control the dialing pace through per call on click or auto-dialing mode. It’s also very effective and helps the agents to maintain efficiency and quality too.
Progressive auto dialer first previews the contact to the agents before dialing. The agent can get an idea about the customer and can prepare themselves too. Robo dialer simply keeps on auto broadcasting voicemail. It’s the fastest and economic way of broadcasting voicemail in a large abundance.
You can choose the best auto dialer according to your campaign requirements and targets. Every dialer is highly productive, convenient, and useful for managing large campaigns conveniently.

How Much Does An Auto dialer cost?
An autodialer is the most economical tool for commercial and non-commercial use. It’s cloud-based software and required a computer and an internet connection for global accessibility. You don’t need to install on-site premises for auto dialer software. Besides, it doesn’t require any contract or monthly subscriptions. You just need to pay according to pay-as-you-go pricing. In fact, you will be charged according to your usage only. Importantly, all the auto dialers are also highly productive and fast.
Why Auto Dialing Is Important?
Indeed, auto dialing reduces the manual work and time too. It conveniently helps you get connected with a large audience in short time. Importantly, it also auto manages campaigns, results, and sales too. Unquestionably, it’s a one-stop solution regarding all your outbound dialing needs.
Auto dialer vs Predictive dialer

Undoubtedly, an autodialer is an advanced outbound automated dialing solution. It also auto-dial numbers manage campaigns, sales, etc. Alternatively, also provides multiple facilities to the business for dialing and voicemail broadcasting. In fact, it’s a cost-effective solution for mass communication. Furthermore, it is subdivided into the predictive, power, progressive, and Robo dialer.


A predictive dialer is a type of autodialer. Consequently, it focuses mainly on agent productivity. The predictive dialer also smartly predicts agent availability time. Moreover, only connects the agents with the live prospects. Alternatively, also skip all unanswered, unproductive calls too. Certainly, provides more leads and sales with auto fast dialing.

Is Auto Dialer Illegal?

Autodial Software is completely legal all over the world under Telephone Consumer Protection Act (TCPA). Besides, auto-dialers must ensure to work under the laws and limitations of the TCPA and (TSR)The Telemarketing Sales Rule.
Clearly, you are also not allowed to dial any emergency number. Indeed, you are strictly not allowed to call any number already listed in the national DNC list. Auto dialer also allows you to add the restricted number to the DNC list for safety.
Furthermore, make sure you don’t use the ROBO dialer without written consent. Pre-recorded calls are also restricted for marketing and advertisement.
Most importantly, reduce abandoned calls and use the specific autodialer that ensures agent availability on every call. Above all, always use dialer360 auto-dialers software under Dialer360 Accounts and Usage Policy.

CLIENT REVIEWS

What our client's say about us

“This software has the most transparency of all that I've used in the past. The reports are really helpful in terms of allowing me to see how individual campaigns are performing and the real-time status bar is a real jewel for seeing what is or isn't happening.“
Coray W.
President
Other Products

Other Products may you like

Predictive Dialer

Predictive dialer software is the best and most extraordinary software for outbound calling. Even though, the best customer experience rises your sales and attracts more clients.

Ringless Voicemail

Ringless voicemail is an efficient way of communication that permits the users to send the message directly into the individual voicemail inbox.

AI Dialer

Optimize your sales with our next-generation Ai dialer. It dials leads when picks up the lead then it connects to this lead to an available agent.
